about_the_game:
Make tough decisions in order to keep your crown. A branching court politics drama, where every choice matters.

Step into the shoes of King Henry of Elander as you try to save your kingdom and yourself from treacherous lords, sinister family members and angry peasants.

Pitchforks and Daggers is a short decision making game. Every choice has its consequences.

You will face many challenges and need to consult your court members, gathering more information in order to decide.

The narrative will branch based on your decisions. Playing the game multiple times is recommended, in order to experience all of the story branches.

King Henry of Elander has many things troubling his mind.

His beloved wife Mary can't have children. And his uncle King Harold of Ervin has challenged his claim to the throne.

The game starts with the murder of one of the peasants by the son of a prominent lord. Will you hang him for murder, Or release him for his father's favor?

Your decision will shape the future of Elander and the coming war with your uncle.

content_descriptors.notes:
As the king you can behead, hang, or poison other characters. The death animations contain pixelated blood.
Some npc's bodies will appear with pixelated blood.
Implied sex and fertility in conversations.
